languages.text: {n}Вы плавно и быстро отступаете от сервитора. Тот протягивает руку, пытается слепо нащупать вас там, где уже никого нет, и вновь замирает — похоже, его мозг не способен быстро справиться с изменившейся информацией об окружении.{/n}

{n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you have already left, and stills once more — it seems its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы плавно и быстро отступаете от сервитора. Тот протягивает руку, пытается слепо нащупать вас там, где уже никого нет, и вновь замирает — похоже, его мозг не способен быстро справиться с изменившейся информацией об окружении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you've already left, and goes still once more — it looks like its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

{n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you've already left, and goes still once more — it looks like its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

{n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you've already left, and goes still once more — it looks like its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

{n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you've already left, and goes still once more — it looks like its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

{n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you have already left, and stills once more — it seems its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

{n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you have already left, and stills once more — it seems its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你以轻盈的动作从机仆身边绕开了。它伸出手来，似乎想在你已经离开的情况下，继续盲目地触碰你。随后，它的动作再次停了下来，似乎它的大脑无法快速处理周围环境的变化。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you have already left, and stills once more — it seems its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你以轻盈的动作从奴工身边绕开了。它伸出手来，似乎想在你已经离开的情况下，继续盲目地触碰你。随后，它的动作再次停了下来，似乎它的大脑无法快速处理周围环境的变化。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con amabilidad y presteza, te alejas del servidor. Alarga su mano, como si intentara tocar ciegamente el espacio que ya no ocupas, y se detiene otra vez. Parece que su mente es incapaz de procesar cambios repentinos en su entorno a velocidades razonables.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you have already left, and stills once more — it seems its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con amabilidad y presteza, te alejas del servidor. Alarga su mano, como si intentara tocar ciegamente el espacio que ya no ocupas, y se detiene otra vez. Parece que su mente es incapaz de procesar cambios repentinos en su entorno a velocidades razonables.{/n}

languages.text: {n}そっと素早く、サーヴィターから距離を置く。サーヴィターは、もう誰もいないその空間を手探りで触れるかのように手を伸ばし、再び動きを止めた。どうやらその脳みそは、周囲の変化を瞬時に処理できないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you have already left, and stills once more — it seems its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}そっと素早く、サーヴィターから距離を置く。サーヴィターは、もう誰もいないその空間を手探りで触れるかのように手を伸ばし、再び動きを止めた。どうやらその脳みそは、周囲の変化を瞬時に処理できないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Geschickt und schnell trittst du von dem Servitor zurück. Er streckt seine Hand aus, als wolle er dich blind dort berühren, wo du gerade noch standest, und erstarrt wieder – anscheinend kann sein Gehirn Veränderungen seiner Umgebung nicht rasch verarbeiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you have already left, and stills once more — it seems its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Geschickt und schnell trittst du von dem Servitor zurück. Er streckt seine Hand aus, als wolle er dich blind dort berühren, wo du gerade noch standest, und erstarrt wieder – anscheinend kann sein Gehirn Veränderungen seiner Umgebung nicht rasch verarbeiten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous éloignez rapidement du servitor tout en gardant votre calme. Il tend la main, comme s'il essayait aveuglément de vous toucher à l'endroit que vous occupiez quelques instants plus tôt, puis s'immobilise à nouveau. Son cerveau semble incapable de réagir rapidement aux changements de son environnement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you have already left, and stills once more — it seems its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous éloignez rapidement du servitor tout en gardant votre calme. Il tend la main, comme s'il essayait aveuglément de vous toucher à l'endroit que vous occupiez quelques instants plus tôt, puis s'immobilise à nouveau. Son cerveau semble incapable de réagir rapidement aux changements de son environnement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rahatça, hızla hizmetörden uzaklaşıyorsun. Az önce olduğun yere körlemesine dokunmaya çalışıyormuş gibi elini uzatıp bir kez daha hareketsiz kalıyor. Beyni, çevresindeki değişiklikleri hızlı bir şekilde işleyemiyor gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gently and swiftly, you step away from the servitor. It stretches out its hand, as if trying blindly to touch you in the space that you have already left, and stills once more — it seems its brain is incapable of quickly processing changes in its surroundings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hafifçe ve hızlı bir şekilde servitörden uzaklaşıyorsun. Az önce olduğun yere körlemesine dokunmaya çalışıyormuş gibi elini uzatıyor ve bir kez daha hareketsiz kalıyor. Beyni, çevresindeki değişiklikleri hızlı bir şekilde işleyemiyor gibi.{/n}
